short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A custom DevTools panel to display network errors and copy their details.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tool for developers who wish to view and easily copy network requests.

The extension creates a new tab in dev tools called `Easy Copy`. This provides a `Copy` button which will copy some fields of the request. The fields that are copied is configurable in the `Settings` tab.

Enjoy :)
